docs.C3_MASTER_HANDOFF.md: Master explainer of C.3 v2 architecture and build status.
docs.C3_FILEMAP.json: Index of important files and their stability.

reasoning.reconcile.py: ReconcileResult + reconcile() — Dual-brain merger with emotion-modulated temps — STABLE v0.1
reasoning.__init__.py: Marks reasoning as a Python package.

memory.spine.py: Memory Spine v2 — JSONL append-only long-term memory store — STABLE v0.1
memory.diff.py: Memory Diff Engine v2 — diff_since() / diff_from_timestamp() / pretty_print() — STABLE v0.1
memory.events.jsonl: Data file — appended at runtime by MemorySpine. DO NOT COMMIT SENSITIVE CONTENT.
memory.__init__.py: Marks memory as a Python package.

tools.c3_memory_diff.py: CLI tool for viewing memory diffs (uses memory.diff). — STABLE v0.1
tools.__init__.py: Marks tools as a Python package.
